resources.string: See the latest from channels you love
Sign in to see your subscriptions
Watch videos you liked, saved, or subscribed
Sign in to see your library
The device does not support this feature
Oops! There is nothing in here

Can't load content.
1) Turn on watch history.
2) Check date and time on the device.
3) Check network connection.
4) Check your proxy settings.
5) Try to sign in to your account.
6) Maybe there is nothing in here.
Video has been removed from recommended
You won\'t see this channel in recommendations

Force exit if video has been opened from external source
Format of the next video will be set according to preset
Show quality info in the controls bar
Selected format isn\'t supported.\nTry to select another one.\nIf this won\'t help try to reboot the device.
Selected VIDEO format isn\'t supported.\nTry to select another one by pressing HQ button in the player.\nIf this won\'t help try to reboot the device.
Selected AUDIO format isn\'t supported.\nTry to select another one by pressing HQ button in the player.\nIf this won\'t help try to reboot the device.
Selected SUBTITLE format isn\'t supported.\nTry to select another one by long pressing CC button in the player.\nIf this won\'t help try to reboot the device.
Player: top right corner ending time
Revert old look of Uploads section
Return to video running in background
Intended for buggy controllers where OK button does not function properly
Show the time with speed correction
Preview or recap of the video
Video has been removed from history
URL isn\'t working or incorrect device time.\nUsually, it\'s a bug in the app.
VIDEO URL isn\'t working or incorrect device time.\nUsually, it\'s a bug in the app.
AUDIO URL isn\'t working or incorrect device time.\nUsually, it\'s a bug in the app.
SUBTITLE URL isn\'t working or incorrect device time.\nUsually, it\'s a bug in the app.
Background play while searching/browsing a channel
Close the app after disconnecting the phone/tablet
Hide shorts from the search result
Test aborted, please fix proxy settings first.
Test aborted, please fix OpenVPN settings first.
An alternative way to synchronize audio/video. It\'s considered obsolete, but in some cases, may help.
Fixes absent bias lighting. Fixes incorrect aspect ratio or video scale. Fixes blank screenshots. Affects performance!
Significantly improves performance on low-end devices. Maximum resolution is 720p.
Warn, this tweak disables the rewinding of streams. Significantly improves live stream performance on low-end devices. Maximum resolution is 1080p.
Warn, this tweak disables the rewinding of streams. Significantly improves live stream performance. Maximum resolution is 4K.
Hides track change notifications. Could be useful on AOSP-based firmware.
Frame drop fix on Amlogic-based devices.
NOTE: pause may not work properly! Tunneled video playback promises benefits such as better audio/video synchronization (AV sync) and smoother playback. Required Android 5+
Remember position of short videos (less than 5 min)
Buttons at the top of the main window
Remove playlist from Playlists section permanently
The app will try to maintain bandwidth corresponding to selected preset instead of matching between resolution, fps and codec.
Sleep timer (if remote isn\'t used for one hour)
Pause the playback if user didn\'t use the remote for one hour
This option disables aligning frames with the display\'s vertical sync signal. This could improve performance on low-end devices by releasing CPU resources.
Don\'t check codec support when starting a video. Could be helpful on buggy firmware.
Could play almost any video, but performance is very poor.
Can\'t do this for foreign playlist
Error: This action can be applied only for owned playlists
Enable this option if SponsorBlock refusing to work by different reasons.
Playback will start automatically when the stream will be ready
To sign-in enter this code on page %s\nNOTE. Works only with Firefox or Chrome browsers.
To link the device enter this code on your phone\'s YouTube app in section Settings/Watch on TV\nNOTE: This only works with the Gboard keyboard!
Codec selection: prefer avc over vp9
Seriously bugged. Use it only if you have trouble with the default recognizer.
External 1 (seriously bugged, in order to work you need to disable access to the microphone)
Show icon on the channel button
Please disable microphone access for the app in order for this recognizer to work properly.
Replace thumbnails with a frame from the video
Add bitrate into the quality info
Revert old behavior of the speed button
In this mode, the user can\'t use search or see any suggested content. The settings page will be password protected.
The app settings will be changed. Make sure that you created a backup of the settings.
Long press this button for additional options
Cronet is the Chromium network stack. Cronet can reduce the latency and increase networking performance, which can help with buffering issues.
On some devices the firmware incorrectly reports some formats as unsupported, even if they are.\n(e.g. 1080p smart TVs tend to report 4k as not supported).
This network engine is the slowest one but has good stability.
Open corresponding section when the app launched from ATV Channels
The official app will be replaced with a so-called \"bridge\". A bridge helps to transfer global search requests to our app.
Fix for situations when the stream too far behind. Note: the stream may start to lag.
Fix lags on Sony TV and some other devices. Note: possible problems with audio synchronization.
Old look of the Home section
Old look of the Channel page
Any settings over the limit can potentially damage speakers
Use current section contents as a playlist
Old look of the update notifications
Notify about updates with a pop-up dialog
Stop excluding this channel from SponsorBlock
Quick advance through the chapters using the popup notification
Switch to the next chapter by clicking on the notification
Enable subtitles only on the current channel
Intended for Amazon Stick devices. May work on other devices too.
Built-in network engine. This engine may have better stability in certain situations.
Show player UI when switching to the next video
Seamless navigation between player button rows
Remember last viewed position in Subscriptions
Remember last viewed position in the pinned playlists
